# softmax(axis:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a softmax along the given axis operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func softmax(axis: Int) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```

## Parameters

- **axis**: The axis over which the operation computes softmax.
title: softmax(axis:)
